# IMBEImisc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A collection of functions commonly used by members of the IMBEI

## Installation

You can install the development version of `IMBEImisc` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r }
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("imbeimainz/IMBEImisc")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library("IMBEImisc")
```
